feed.title: Neuroscout Blog - Posts by Alejandro de la Vega

entry.title: Big news from the Neuroscout team!
entry.content:
We’re excited to share that our paper: “Neuroscout, a unified platform for generalizable and reproducible fMRI research” is available in eLife. We break down Neuroscout’s approach and validate it across 35 distinct naturalistic experiments.

Here are some of the highlights, along with some new features you might have missed since you last visited.
entry.summary: We’re excited to share that our paper: “Neuroscout, a unified platform for generalizable and reproducible fMRI research” is available in eLife. We break down Neuroscout’s approach and validate it across 35 distinct naturalistic experiments.Here are some of the highlights, along with some new features you might have missed since you last visited.
